data.title: [Esther Rolle speaking at the premiere of "Bethune"]
meta_keywords: Black Academy of Arts and Letters (Dallas
The Black Academy of Arts and Letters
Arts and Crafts - Theatre - Motion Pictures
data.meta_description: Video recording from The Black Academy of Arts and Letters recorded during the premiere of "Bethune" in July 1991. The footage shows starring actress Esther Rolle speaking at a podium on a stage below a big screen where a slideshow of old photos are being shown as she talks.
